archimate:Requirement.name: PE.1.2.7: Individuals should be required to obtain written approval before leaving the organisation's premises with critical equipment (e.g. servers, network devices, printers and specialist equipment).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
